pr_title: Fix issue in RabbitMQ compiler plugin

timeline.message:
Fix issue in RabbitMQ compiler plugin

Fixes https://github.com/ballerina-platform/ballerina-lang/issues/22704

timeline.bodyText: Why do we need this class?
timeline.author: ThisaruGuruge
